additional_info:
*** ABOUT THIS EXAMPLE: This is an example of a Fermi GBM ALERT GCN notice. Only strictly necessary fields are present. This 'about' note is not going to be part of streamed/real notices. This field, 'additional_info', may be empty or missing altogether in case of no comments. An example of a typical notice comment follows. ***

Lightcurve and other quicklook files will not be created until about 15 minutes after the trigger.
